amendments.title: Little Footsteps Tuition Shield
amendments.summary: Guarantees that every childcare credit disbursed through Echo Bank remains non-taxable community aid.

amendments.title: Sovereign Continuity Covenant
amendments.summary: Mandates mirrored ledgers across three jurisdictions with a two-of-three multi-sig recovery quorum.

amendments.title: Transparency.bank Charter Upgrade
amendments.summary: Requires the transparency.bank portal to stream live inflow/outflow data and publish compliance proofs.
